div.div: EROD activities (estimated marginal means ±95% CI) in female livers of ten passerine species.
div.p: Dark grey bars represent insectivores and white bars granivores. Letters above the bars indicate significant differences to the other species (GLM, Tukey's test <0.05): (a) A.sch = A. schoenobaenus, b) P.tro = P. trochilus, c) A.sci = A. scirpaceus, d) P.maj = P. major, e) H.rus = H. rustica, f) P.dom = P. domesticus, g) C.cae = C. caeruleus, h) F.coe = F. coelebs, i) C.chl = C. chloris, j) E.sch = E. schoeniclus).
